main event: A 15-year-old boy observed several disc-shaped objects in Bradenton, Florida on January 17, 1969.
interesting points: The boy mentioned the main object ejected two smaller objects that circled it,One of the smaller objects came very close to the ground and hovered for a few minutes,The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes and the main object hovered very low over the ground before shooting up at a 90-degree angle,The object was described as being about 2/3 the size of a football field and illuminated the area as it passed,The boy reported the sighting to the Air Force and local police but no unusual findings were discovered.
sighted object: several disc-shaped objects and two smaller objects
